args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Windshield Wipers May Fail

Oshkosh Corporation (Oshkosh) is recalling certain 2024-2025 ICE 2WD, ICE AWD, and BEV 2WD Next Generation delivery vehicles.  The wiper arm nuts may be loose, causing the wipers to fail.Windshield wiper failure can reduce driver visibility, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 169.0
